Read PURPLE QC file

Source: R/purple.R
purple_qc_read.Rd

Reads the purple.qc file.

purple_qc_read(x)

Arguments

x

Path to the purple.qc file.

Value

The input file as a tibble and a summarised tibble with a description of each metric.

Examples

x <- system.file("extdata/purple/purple.qc", package = "gpgr")
(q <- purple_qc_read(x))

#> $raw
#> # A tibble: 10 x 2
#>    key                           value             
#>    <chr>                         <chr>             
#>  1 QCStatus                      WARN_DELETED_GENES
#>  2 Method                        NORMAL            
#>  3 CopyNumberSegments            1428              
#>  4 UnsupportedCopyNumberSegments 0                 
#>  5 Purity                        0.8600            
#>  6 AmberGender                   MALE              
#>  7 CobaltGender                  MALE              
#>  8 DeletedGenes                  7782              
#>  9 Contamination                 0.0               
#> 10 GermlineAberrations           NONE              
#> 
#> $summary
#> # A tibble: 8 x 4
#>       n variable       value           details                                  
#>   <dbl> <chr>          <glue>          <glue>                                   
#> 1     1 QC_Status      WARN_DELETED_G… "See 'Description'."                     
#> 2    13 Method         NORMAL          "Fit method (NORMAL, HIGHLY_DIPLOID, SOM…
#> 3    14 CopyNumberSeg… 1428 (Unsuppor… "# of CN segments."                      
#> 4     2 Purity         0.8600          ""                                       
#> 5    17 Gender         Amber: MALE; C… ""                                       
#> 6    14 DeletedGenes   7782            "# of homozygously deleted genes."       
#> 7    15 Contamination  0.0             "Rate of contamination in tumor sample a…
#> 8    16 GermlineAberr… NONE            "Can be one or more of: KLINEFELTER, TRI…
#>
